thread.title: Ravens safety Matt Elam arrested on drug charges
thread.title_full: Ravens safety Matt Elam arrested on drug charges

author: Brad Crawford
title: Ravens safety Matt Elam arrested on drug charges

organizations.name: baltimore ravens newsletter newsletter  baltimore ravens

text:
Ravens safety Matt Elam arrested on drug charges The former first-round pick was booked on multiple drug-related charges early Sunday. Slot to Baltimore Ravens Newsletter Newsletter 
Baltimore Ravens safety and former Florida All-SEC standout Matt Elam was arrested on drug charges early Sunday in South Florida, according to Miami-Dade police records . 
Pulled over for reckless driving, Elam, a former first-round pick in 2013, was booked at 3:45 a.m. Sunday on charges of possession of more than 20 grams of cannabis, possession of cannabis with the intent to sell or deliver, and possession of a controlled substance. 
Police found 126 grams of marijuana and three grams of oxycodone in his vehicle, per Pro Football Talk . Author
